prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Bibliography of Southern United States History Since 1865, Accession #2175, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This volume was given to the Library by Mr. Cappon of Charlottesville, Virginia, on May 23, 1945.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This item is a typescript volume entitled Bibliography of Southern United States History Since 1865, Vol. II, Virginia, June 1927, by Lester J. Cappon, research associate at the Institute for Research in the Social Sciences, University of Virginia.
